txt.en: The Healing Hands can aid your companions in combat and help them overcome the most difficult challenges.
The Path of the Healing Hands
You have begun to follow the Path of the Healing Hands. If you follow this path to its end, you may learn how to better restore the morale and vigour of your companions in combat.
Completed the quest 'A Cry of Vengeance'
Begin down the Path of the Healing Hands
Complete the quest 'A Cry of Vengeance'
There are many challenges on along the Path of the Healing Hands. Taking the first step may be the most difficult....
